title: Programmer/Analyst
summary: Consulting across law enforcement, logistics, and agribusiness, building C#/ASP.NET/ActionScript solutions with SQL Server backends.
description: Built a C# mobile application for a Sheriff's department to capture and sync field data.
Delivered full-stack .NET and SQL Server development for Zen-Noh Grain, supporting inventory and operations workflows.
Created an ActionScript + ASP.NET tracking application for shipments and tug boats with a custom web backend.
Designed database schemas and service endpoints to keep data consistent across the web and mobile surfaces.
Worked directly with clients to prioritize features and ship iterations quickly as a consultant.
